languages.text: "Его путь был заблуждением от начала и до конца. Хоть элантах и протянул{mf||а} ему руку, чтобы вывести на новую тропу, но любая помощь бесплодна, если ее не желают".

traits.locale_text: "Его путь был заблуждением от начала и до конца. Хоть элантах протянул/а ему руку, чтобы вывести на новую тропу, но любая помощь бесплодна, если ее не желают".

languages.text: "His path was a fallacy from beginning to end. And even though the elantach offered him {mf|his|her} hand in hopes of guiding him onto a different road, unwanted help never bears fruit."
languages.original_text: "Его путь был заблуждением от начала и до конца. Хоть элантах и протянул{mf||а} ему руку, чтобы вывести на новую тропу, но любая помощь бесплодна, если ее не желают".

traits.locale_text: "His path was a fallacy from beginning to end. And even though the elantach offered him {mf|his|her} hand in hopes of guiding him onto a different road, unwanted help never bears fruit."
"His path was a fallacy from beginning to end. And even though the elantach offered him {mf|his|her} hand in hopes of guiding him onto a different road, unwanted help never bears fruit."
"His path was a fallacy from beginning to end. And even though the elantach offered him {mf|his|her} hand in hopes of guiding him onto a different road, unwanted help never bears fruit."
"His path was a fallacy from beginning to end. And even though the elantach offered him {mf|his|her} hand in hopes of guiding him onto a different road, unwanted help never bears fruit."
"His path was a fallacy from beginning to end. And even though the elantach offered him {mf|his|her} hand in hopes of guiding him onto a different road, unwanted help never bears fruit."
"His path was a fallacy from beginning to end. And even though the elantach offered him {mf|his|her} hand in hopes of guiding him onto a different road, unwanted help never bears fruit."

languages.text: 「彼の歩んだ道は、最初から最後まで間違いだった。エランタが別の道へ導こうと、{mf|彼|彼女}の手を差し伸べたにもかかわらず…望まれぬ助けは、決して実を結ばないものだ」
languages.original_text: "His path was a fallacy from beginning to end. And even though the elantach offered him {mf|his|her} hand in hopes of guiding him onto a different road, unwanted help never bears fruit."

traits.locale_text: 「彼の歩んだ道は、最初から最後まで間違いだった。エランタが別の道へ導こうと、{mf|彼|彼女}の手を差し伸べたにもかかわらず…望まれぬ助けは、決して実を結ばないものだ」

languages.text: "Sein Pfad war von Anfang bis ein Ende ein einziger Irrtum. Und obwohl {mf|der|die} Elantach ihm die Hand angeboten hat, um ihn auf einen anderen Weg zu führen, trägt ungebetene Hilfe niemals Früchte."
languages.original_text: "His path was a fallacy from beginning to end. And even though the elantach offered him {mf|his|her} hand in hopes of guiding him onto a different road, unwanted help never bears fruit."

traits.locale_text: "Sein Pfad war von Anfang bis ein Ende ein einziger Irrtum. Und obwohl {mf|der|die} Elantach ihm die Hand angeboten hat, um ihn auf einen anderen Weg zu führen, trägt ungebetene Hilfe niemals Früchte."

languages.text: « Sa voie était pavée de fausseté. L'elantach lui a bien tendu la main pour tenter de le guider sur un autre chemin, mais une aide non désirée ne porte jamais ses fruits. »
languages.original_text: "His path was a fallacy from beginning to end. And even though the elantach offered him {mf|his|her} hand in hopes of guiding him onto a different road, unwanted help never bears fruit."

traits.locale_text: « Sa voie était pavée de fausseté. L'elantach lui a bien tendu la main pour tenter de le guider sur un autre chemin, mais une aide non désirée ne porte jamais ses fruits. »

languages.text: «Su senda fue una falacia de principio a fin. Y aunque {mf|el|la} elantach le tendió la mano con la esperanza de guiarlo por un camino distinto, la ayuda no deseada siempre es infructuosa».
languages.original_text: "His path was a fallacy from beginning to end. And even though the elantach offered him {mf|his|her} hand in hopes of guiding him onto a different road, unwanted help never bears fruit."

traits.locale_text: «Su senda fue una falacia de principio a fin. Y aunque {mf|el|la} elantach le tendió la mano con la esperanza de guiarlo por un camino distinto, la ayuda no deseada siempre es infructuosa».

languages.text: “他的道路从头到尾都充满了谬误。尽管外界人向他伸出了援手，希望引导他走上不同的道路，但他根本不愿接受帮助。因此，他也注定不会有其他结果。”
languages.original_text: "His path was a fallacy from beginning to end. And even though the elantach offered him {mf|his|her} hand in hopes of guiding him onto a different road, unwanted help never bears fruit."

traits.locale_text: “他的道路从头到尾都充满了谬误。尽管外界人向他伸出了援手，希望引导他走上不同的道路，但他根本不愿接受帮助。因此，他也注定不会有其他结果。”

languages.text: "Tuttuğu yol baştan sona yanılgılarla örülüydü. Elantach, ona el verip doğru yolu göstermek istediyse. Ancak zorla yapılan iyilikten hayır gelmez."
languages.original_text: "His path was a fallacy from beginning to end. And even though the elantach offered him {mf|his|her} hand in hopes of guiding him onto a different road, unwanted help never bears fruit."

traits.locale_text: "Tuttuğu yol baştan sona yanılgılarla örülüydü. Elantach, ona el verip doğru yolu göstermek istediyse de zorla yapılan iyilik, hayır getirmez."

languages.original_text: "His path was a fallacy from beginning to end. And even though the elantach offered him {mf|his|her} hand in hopes of guiding him onto a different road, unwanted help never bears fruit."
